quote: Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow on it. – Vincent van Gogh
fact: The first bomb the Allies dropped on Berlin in WWII killed the only elephant in the Berlin Zoo.
joke: I had a dream that I was a muffler last night. I woke up exhausted!
